CIRCULAR  NO. 22 / 98 
 
 
Subject :  OPERATIONAL EXERCISE BY NSG TROOPS AT AIRPORTS. 
 
 
NSG troops frequently carry out operational exercise / familiarization training at the 
airports.  Such exercises / tracings shall be conducted at the airports in the country subject to 
adherence to the following conditions: - 
 
(i) 
The NSG would keep BCAS Hqrs. / Regional Office informed about such 
training exercises well in advance. 
 
(ii) 
The NSG troops will either carry dummy weapons or unloaded weapons 
(without ammunition) and inspector I/C Control Room will ensure the same 
after conducting physical checks of these weapons. 
 
(iii) 
An officer from BCAS or Airport Security Unit will assist the training team 
and coordinate the exercise. 
 
(iv) 
In case an official of NSG does not have a regular PIC with him, one time 
entry permit will be issued to him by the Regional Dy. Commissioner of 
Security (CA) or the local pass issuing authority. 
 
This issues with the approval of Commission of Security (Civil Aviation) 
 
 (J.P.Verma) 
Officer on special Duty (Int)
